Chinese.name: 自定义认证函数
Chinese.description: 本示例基于 API 网关实现自定义认证功能。
Chinese.attention: 该云函数使用了API 网关触发器，返回值需要构造为Json格式。

English.name: APIGWCustomAuthDemo
English.description: This demo uses API GW to implement the custom authentication.
English.attention: This demo uses api gw trigger, and the return value needs to be constructed in JSON format.
